categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Shar'Ack system was located in the Atrivis sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Shar'Ack.

A forested world, Shar'Ack was the homeworld of the sentient Shaliz'Na species. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire controlled all liquor manufactured on and imported to Shar'Ack. Around that time, the Shaliz'Na musician Tyric had left Shar'Ack and was traveling throughout the galaxy, eventually joining the Rebel Alliance.
The Shar'Ack system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-5.
